summary:
Senior Financial Accountant based in the Netherlands.  More than 10 years of business experience including several multinational companies (in Latin-America and Europe). Solution-focused with a practical but due diligent approach, constructive challenger, flexible, open minded and fair negotiator. Cutting through the chase and getting to the bottom of things. Straight shooter/polite, effective and strong communicator. Finding ways to improve processes. 

#financialaccounting #taxexposure #restructuring #corporateaccounting #teamplayer #financialreporting #adviser
